item.title: Honey fungus on tree, 17th October
item.description:
This tree at the top of the road (closest to Birchwood Rd) is being attacked by honey fungus. There are some other, recently planted saplings nearby on the street that will also be affected if no treatment is carried out.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Derrick Road, Elmers End, London
